trans-unit.source: Slith Firewalker

trans-unit.source: Haste Whenever Slith Firewalker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

trans-unit.source: The slith incubate in the Great Furnace's heat, emerging on Mirrodin's surface only when the four suns have aligned overhead.
trans-unit.target: The slith incubate in the Great Furnace's heat, emerging on Mirrodin's surface only when the four suns have aligned overhead.

trans-unit.source: Royal Assassin
trans-unit.target: Royal Assassin

trans-unit.source: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.
trans-unit.target: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.

trans-unit.source: Trained in the arts of stealth, royal assassins choose their victims carefully, relying on timing and precision rather than brute force..
trans-unit.target: Trained in the arts of stealth, royal assassins choose their victims carefully, relying on timing and precision rather than brute force..

trans-unit.source: Sakura-Tribe Elder
trans-unit.target: Sakura-Tribe Elder

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

trans-unit.source: There were no tombstones in orochi territory. Slain warriors were buried with a tree sapling, so they would become a part of the forest after death.
trans-unit.target: There were no tombstones in orochi territory. Slain warriors were buried with a tree sapling, so they would become a part of the forest after death.

trans-unit.source: Shard Phoenix
trans-unit.target: Shard Phoenix

trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Sacrifice Shard Phoenix: It deals 2 damage to each creature without flying. {R}{R}{R}: Return Shard Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your upkeep.
trans-unit.target: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Sacrifice Shard Phoenix: It deals 2 damage to each creature without flying. {R}{R}{R}: Return Shard Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your upkeep.

trans-unit.source: Soltari Priest
trans-unit.target: Soltari Priest

trans-unit.source: Protection from red Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
trans-unit.target: Protection from red Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

trans-unit.source: "In Rath," the priest said, "there is even greater need for prayer."
trans-unit.target: "In Rath," the priest said, "there is even greater need for prayer."

trans-unit.source: Whirling Dervish
trans-unit.target: Whirling Dervish

trans-unit.source: Protection from black At the beginning of each end step, if Whirling Dervish dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: Protection from black At the beginning of each end step, if Whirling Dervish dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

trans-unit.source: Amid this whirling hurricane of blades, there is no calm eye in which the hapless can find shelter.
trans-unit.target: Amid this whirling hurricane of blades, there is no calm eye in which the hapless can find shelter.

trans-unit.source: Glorious Anthem
trans-unit.target: Glorious Anthem

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: Creatures you control get +1/+1.

trans-unit.source: The songs of angels are perceived not as words in the ears but as stirrings in the soul.
trans-unit.target: The songs of angels are perceived not as words in the ears but as stirrings in the soul.

trans-unit.source: Elvish Champion
trans-unit.target: Elvish Champion

trans-unit.source: Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
trans-unit.target: Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

trans-unit.source: "We've endured your slights to Gaea with the grace of tolerance. Now behold the grace of our ferocity."
trans-unit.target: "We've endured your slights to Gaea with the grace of tolerance. Now behold the grace of our ferocity."
